channel.title: 667 + Correct Level Up sounds and slayer task sound
channel.description:
For slayer sound: (task complete http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Slayer_assignment) NPC.java [code]killer.getPackets().sendMusicEffect(62);[/code]
All correct level up sounds: LevelUp.java
[code] public static final int[] SKILL_LEVEL_UP_MUSIC_EFFECTS = { 30, 38, 66, 48, 58, 56, 52, 34, 70, 44, 42, 40, 36, 64, 54, 46, 28, 68, 61, 10, 60, 50, 32, 301, 417 };[/code]
Took me a little while to find them, it's a nice tiny feature since some players actually play with sound on
